content: Hello, I was asked to find a problem in a file getting NullPointerException in the validator. Turns out, it was from the profile tag: <profile>xxx</profile> instead of <profile value="xxx"/>. It would be nice to have the validator be more precise for that error. Thank you.
well, it would be precise about the error, if it didn't blow up.
can you make a git issue against core to fix that?
